message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can always negotiate further if you'd like.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to come down a bit, but I think 750k for me is fair considering the value of money is dropping.  Let's wrap this up before we lose even more!
I'm getting worried about the inflation, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'll meet you halfway on the previous offer. Your turn to think about it!
